attributes.action: Stop Hestler from getting his bonus with RBS
attributes.additional_details:
Stephen Hester will receive more than three million shares from taxpayer-owned RBS and a bonus worth almost £1m.

This is utterly unacceptable.  Hester's package meanshe will be paid in three days what a soldier in Afghanistan, "risking his life", earned in a whole year.

Since he joined in November 2008, the bank has cut 33,000 jobs.

In tghese times when people are feeling the pimch and losing jobs this cannot be ethically and morally right! Shame on him!
